start.name: Disc
text: Grass, hay, gas, you want it? It's yours my friend.
Hello, do I smell grass?
Good morning, afternoon, or night! Whatcha need?
Baa bah baa baaa? (Hey, how can I help you?)
Oh, hey [Player]! Look who's got a job now...
Appears only if the player is friends with Disc on Roblox
Hiiii!! Hello!!! Hey!!! Wassup!!! Heyoo!!!
Do you want Non Toxic Cola NobleReign Burger hello?
Oh uhmm... hello? Wait, wrong punctuation mark...
Welcome to GOATed Gas, we accept grass clippings as payment!

walking.name: Disc
text: Aw, we were about to start talking! :(
Have a nice day!
Wha...?
See you later!
Baa bah!

walking2.name: Disc
text: Aw, we were about to start talking! :(
Have a nice day!
Wha...?
See you later!
Baa bah!

talk.name: Disc
text: Oh, sure! What do you wanna talk about?
choices: What's with the lack of, well, stuff?

talkA1.name: Disc
text: We're in the convenience store of GOATed Gas! If you want, you can buy stuff from the shelves using Passenger Rep! You'll keep it forever.

talkA2.name: Disc
text: Well, we're kinda in the middle of nowhere.. we don't get deliveries that often. Still, feel free to buy something!

talkA3.name: Disc
text: Uhm, I'm a new hire here. I'm pretty new to this gas station stuff... Although, I should've gotten a better job than this.

talkA4.name: Disc
text: I like grass, that is all

talkA5a.name: Disc
text: Yeah! I like to sort items on the shelves, it gives me something to do. Also, I get FREE SNACKS!!!!

talkA5b.name: Disc
text: At least I'm making my own money, unlike you, begging for mommy's credit card!

talkA6a.name: Disc
text: <highlight>No...</highlight>

talkA6b.name: Disc
text: ok maybe

funa.name: Disc
text: Oh, I know a lot of stuff! What do you wanna know?

funb.name: Disc
text: I haven't worked here for long, but I'll try..

SfunA0.name: Disc
text: What an uncommon question.. Uhh..
Oh, like who comes around here? Let me remember...

varA1a.name: System
text: Would you like a random variant or to select a variant?

varA1b.name: System
text: Which variant would you like to select?
choices: "A few weeks ago, a tall, orange dragon came in.. or maybe it was a dog..? They came in such a huge frenzy though!..."
"Some driver guy came in about a week ago.."
"I saw a icy blue wolf come in here the other day.. I think they said their name was like..."
"I don't know where this person came from, but this person named 'D6' appeared in our trash bins..."
"Everyone in town is pretty nice, except for that one robot dude..."
"Once, a tiny little gray cat came through here.. he was super cute!"

SfunA1a.name: Disc
text: A few weeks ago, a tall, orange dragon came in.. or maybe it was a dog..? They came in such a huge frenzy though! Fur frazzled, looking frantically for something.. Then they came up to me and they were all like..

SfunA1b.name: Disc
text: "This is important, do you have any, uh, pen tips?? For drawing tablets??? Any at all???"

SfunA1c.name: Disc
text: I had to be all like, 'Sir, this is a gas station convenience store!'

SfunA1d.name: Disc
text: After that, they looked really defeated and left...

SfunA1e.name: Disc
text: I hope they're okay!

SfunA2a.name: Disc
text: Some driver guy came in about a week ago..

SfunA2b.name: Disc
text: They said they were running from the police, and I was like 'WHAT??'

SfunA2c.name: Disc
text: He explained his situation, though.. Apparently he stole a straw from Bloxdonalds or something..?

SfunA2d.name: Disc
text: I kinda feel bad for him now.. What a way to become a felon...

SfunA3a.name: Disc
text: I saw a icy blue wolf come in here the other day.. I think they said their name was like.. Frozen..? Freezy..? Frostbite??

SfunA3b.name: Green
text: Right, that dude.. they stole the last of those frozen sponge pops! Just sprinted out of the store like it was nothing!

SfunA3c.name: Disc
text: Oh, right.. well if you see him, tell him to pay us back!

SfunA4a.name: Disc
text: I don't know where this person came from, but this person named 'D6' appeared in our trash bins. We tried to get rid of D6, but ever since the 'incident' happened a few days back...

SfunA4b.name: Disc
text: We gave up and just... let them sit there... *sniff*

SfunA4c.name: Green
text: Oh, don't worry about Disc. D6 threw a 2 ton slab of concrete at his head and narrowly missed. He's just a bit traumatized.

SfunA5a.name: Disc
text: Everyone in town is pretty nice, except for that one robot dude...

SfunA5b.name: Disc
text: They always brought their Mini-Bus, and ruined our shelves!

SfunA5c.name: Disc
text: It got to the point where we decided to add spikes to the floor entrance... Let's just say that they stopped coming in after that. >:}

SfunA6.name: Disc
text: Once, a tiny little gray cat came through here.. he was super cute!

SfunA6B1a.name: Disc
text: WHAT?! Don't do that!!

SfunA6B1b.name: Green
text: Disc, I'm pretty sure they're just joking...

SfunA6B1c.name: Disc
text: I knowww, but still.. don't do that!

SfunA6B2.name: Disc
text: YOU KNOW HIM??

SfunA6B3.name: Disc
text: Well, he ended up buying a bunch of frozen taquitos... His little arms could barely hold them all... I don't really know what happened to him after that.

AfunA0.name: Disc
text: The area? I might have a story or two...
Oh, sure! Lemme remember..

varA2a.name: System
text: Would you like a random variant or to select a variant?

varA2b.name: System
text: Which variant would you like to select?
choices: "You might think 'Hey, this stop looks kinda cheap."
"One time, I went to visit the yellow house to see a friend. There was like, a bunch of people chilling in their backyard."

AfunA1a.name: Disc
text: You might think 'Hey, this stop looks kinda cheap.'

AfunA1b.name: Disc
text: Well, you can blame the local representatives for that one... They were really lazy and just used blueprints from Google Images...

AfunA1c.name: Disc
text: Now people always call us the 'Free Model Station'...

AfunA1d.name: Disc
text: But, rent costs next to nothing, so I guess I can't complain...

AfunA2a.name: Disc
text: One time, I went to visit the yellow house to see a friend. There was like, a bunch of people chilling in their backyard.

AfunA2b.name: Disc
text: I was just taking a glance, and then one of them tried to jump on the trampoline...

AfunA2c.name: Disc
text: They got launched into space! I guess the trampoline script lacked a debounce part in it...

AfunA2d.name: Disc
text: Luckily nobody was really hurt. They bought a higher quality trampoline a few days after.

func.name: Disc
text: Oh, you mean the one out there? Yeah, I used to ride it all the time! What about it? (Page 1/2)

fund.name: Disc
text: Oh, you mean the one out there? Yeah, I used to ride it all the time! What about it? (Page 2/2)

BfunA1a.name: Disc
text: You know, the bus used to be different back when I rode it.. I remember when it was blocker than it is today...

BfunA1b.name: Disc
text: When I heard about that lnrOS upgrade, though, I was pretty excited!

BfunA1c.name: Disc
text: The upgrade was so cool, though! The bus had like, eyes and emotions! It was awesome, it's like it was your friend!

BfunA2.name: Disc
text: Oh yeah, that small cramped bathroom inside the stairs, right..? I've heard that if you flush the toilet while you're sitting on it, you might not be staying in that cramped room for so long...

BfunA3a.name: Disc
text: Ever since that wolf stole the last of those sponge pops, we haven't gotten another shipment of them.

BfunA3b.name: Disc
text: Apparently, those were discontinued a long time ago. We were unknowingly hoarding them like our life depended it!

BfunA3c.name: Disc
text: Although those popsicles are gone, I do know some ice cream trucks have those sponges somewhere, they're just really rare...

BfunA3d.name: Green
text: True... If you ever come across even one of those popsicles, hide it with your life. Don't lose it, don't eat it, don't let someone steal it. Just lock up your fridge. You heard me, lock up your fridge.

BfunA3e.name: Green
text: Actually, that's not enough. LOCK UP YOUR HOUSE.

BfunA3f.name: Green
text: LOCK UP YOUR ENTIRE NEIGHBORHOOD, EVEN! YOU MUST PROTECT IT AT ALL COSTS!

BfunA4a.name: Disc
text: Oh, so you wanna know about why so much stuff occurs all the time? About why the road feels like it goes on forever? About how none of our choices really matter? Huh, [Player]? Don't you want to learn? Don't you know that the bus is--

BfunA4b.name: Green
text: Hey Disc, ain't that a little existential? I think you're freakin' out the customer!

BfunA4c.name: Disc
text: WHAT ABOUT THE SECRET BUTTON THAT'S HIDDEN NEAR THE--!

BfunA4d.name: Green
text: DISC, WE CAN'T TELL THEM ABOUT THAT!

BfunA4e.name: Disc
text: Huh...? Whaa...? S-Sorry!

BfunA5a.name: Disc
text: Honestly, I've never known who or what made all those different kinds of cola in the first place!

BfunA5b.name: Disc
text: I've only really seen those really cold ones on the top of the bus, and the spicy one right next to the pizza...

BfunA5c.name: Disc
text: I've heard rumors that there's a third cola out there.. It's red, but when you drink it, well...

BfunA5d.name: Disc
text: E-Ehm, it's just a rumor, right..?

checkout.name: Disc
text: Oh, you wanna checkout? Alright!
Let me help with that!

varA3a.name: System
text: Would you like a random condition or to select a condition?

varA3b.name: System
text: Which condition would you like to select?
choices: If the player has no items to buy
If the player has an item that can be bought
If the player's total price exceeds their current Passenger Rep

checkoutA1.name: Disc
text: So, no items? Ok...
Well, I guess I could check out that little speck of dust for 0.01 rep. But I'm not gonna accept that!
Empty, mpty, mt,
You do know air doesn't come with a barcode, right?
So, you're gonna buy air? That's going to cost you 99999999999 rep!

checkoutA2.name: Disc
text: The luxurious items are going for [total price] rep! Going once... Going Twice...
Psst... that things gonna cost you [total price] rep... Do you want it?
choices: Instead of rep, can I pay with pearcoin?
Appears only if the player has a Pearcoin

varA4a.name: System
text: Would you like a random condition or select a condition?

varA4b.name: System
text: Which condition would you like to select?
choices: If the player tries to buy the Flying Skillbook again
If the player successfully buys the Flying Skillbook

checkoutA2B1a.name: Disc
text: A <highlight type="rainbow">pearcoin</highlight><sup><highlight type="rainbow">TM</highlight></sup>? I've never heard of that before, but it sounds fun..! Let's do it! One <highlight type="rainbow">pearcoin</highlight><sup><highlight type="rainbow">TM</highlight></sup> for..-

checkoutA2B1b.name: Green
text: Disc, no... That's just another one of those.. crypto, scam things... For your information, we only take rep. None of that digital currency garbage. Get lost.

checkoutA2B1c.name: Disc
text: U-uhhm, yeah! What she said! Get lost..!!

checkoutA2B2.name: Disc
text: Alright, all of your buyable items have been cleared!

dealA1.name: Disc
text: Have fun with your stuff! It's bonded with you now.

dealA2.name: Disc
text: ... and, you already owned some of the stuff you bought, so I didn't charge you for it! You saved 100 rep.

dealA3.name: Disc
text: Have fun with your stuff! It's bonded with you now. ... oh yeah, we glued the pages on those skillbooks for security purposes. Let me just... There! Now have fun!
Have fun with your stuff! It's bonded with you now. ... by the way, you're not using this skill for anything malicious, right?
Have fun with your stuff! It's bonded with you now. ... oh, and the skillbook! Hold on, I gotta get a saw blade just to open every...single... page...
Have fun with your stuff! It's bonded with you now. ... I, uh, unglued the book, by the way.

nothx.name: Disc
text: Oh.. well, if you change your mind, let me know!

checkoutA3.name: Disc
text: Sorry, but you don't have enough rep to purchase that!
Hey [Player], if you look to the top of your screen, you'll see that you don't have enough rep to purchase this...
choices: Really? How about a shiny pearcoin instead?
Appears only if the player has a Pearcoin

checkoutA3B1a.name: Disc
text: A <highlight type="rainbow">pearcoin</highlight><sup><highlight type="rainbow">TM</highlight></sup>? I've never heard of that before, but it sounds fun..! Let's do it! One <highlight type="rainbow">pearcoin</highlight><sup><highlight type="rainbow">TM</highlight></sup> for..-

checkoutA3B1b.name: Green
text: Disc, no... That's just another one of those.. crypto, scam things... For your information, we only take rep. None of that digital currency garbage. Get lost.

checkoutA3B1c.name: Disc
text: U-uhhm, yeah! What she said! Get lost..!!

checkoutA3B2.name: Disc
text: Alright, all of your buyable items have been cleared!
